dc_title_s: The world : prepared expressly for the National Geographic Magazine, showing the political divisions, including those established after the World War.
dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures.  Prime meridian: Greenwich.  Insets: North polar region -- South polar regions -- Natural vegetation and ocean currents -- Density of populations and prevailing winds.|67 x 100 centimeters|Scale [1:39,600,000]. 1 inch = 625 miles at equator|General Map Collection
